channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SP Project & Document Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- SP Project & Document Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-1551|2024-08-03T00:10:03.030Z -- unknown -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin before 4.58 uses an easily guessable path to store user files, bad actors could use that to access other users' sensitive files.

item.title: CVE-2024-3749|2024-08-01T20:20:01.139Z -- unknown -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin through 4.71 lacks proper access controllers and allows a logged in user to view and download files belonging to another user

item.title: CVE-2024-3748|2024-08-01T20:20:01.097Z -- unknown -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin through 4.71 is missing validation in its upload function, allowing a user to manipulate the `user_id` to make it appear that a file was uploaded by another user

item.title: CVE-2024-3749|2024-06-04T17:31:08.986Z -- unknown -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin through 4.71 lacks proper access controllers and allows a logged in user to view and download files belonging to another user

item.title: CVE-2024-3748|2024-06-11T18:53:59.679Z -- unknown -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin through 4.71 is missing validation in its upload function, allowing a user to manipulate the `user_id` to make it appear that a file was uploaded by another user
